long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We created this game to help you improve your mood and focus as well as to lower your daily stress while having mega fun with cute symbols.

It is designed to provide a meditation like game experience to help you clear your mind while staying alert.

Stay calm and carry on :)

It is also available on App Store and Google Play Store for your mobile phone! 


FEATURES

- Hit & pop the target symbol, which is shown at the beginning of each level.

- Collect bonus icons to complete your level goals.

- Random jackpots and additional bonuses will help you progress.

- Complete tasks and special levels to collect gifts.

- Unlimited levels for you to enjoy.

- Endless fun as the levels get gradually more challenging.

- Addictive and limitless fun to help you unwind and stay alert.

- You can play offline

- It is a fun game for kids and also for adults.

- It is a casual, cartoony game where each level is an adventure to conquer fun.

- Mega Pop is a great alternative for board, indie and arcade game lovers.
